entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Port Colborne

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
